name: Super Lonely Basketball Simulator
description:
A short basketball themed physics puzzler.  Get the ball into the basket all by yourself by dragging and dropping the black rectangle with your mouse.  Press the SPACE bar to set the ball in motion.  Press SPACE again to reset it or to advance to the next level once beaten.  Hit the LEFT ARROW key to go back to the previous level once beaten and the ESC. key closes the game.

I am hoping to expand on this game much more but here are 10 simple levels to play with for now.  Thanks for checking it out!
